name: flickr.people.getPhotosOf
description: Returns a list of photos containing a particular Flickr member.
authentication: This method does not require authentication.

arguments.name: api_key
arguments.description: Your API application key.See herefor more details.

arguments.name: user_id
arguments.description: The NSID of the user you want to find photos of. A value of "me" will search against photos of the calling user, for authenticated calls.

arguments.name: owner_id
arguments.description: An NSID of a Flickr member. This will restrict the list of photos to those taken by that member.

arguments.name: extras
arguments.description: A comma-delimited list of extra information to fetch for each returned record. Currently supported fields are:description,license,date_upload,date_taken,date_person_added,owner_name,icon_server,original_format,last_update,geo,tags,machine_tags,o_dims,views,media,path_alias,url_sq,url_t,url_s,url_q,url_m,url_n,url_z,url_c,url_l,url_o

arguments.name: per_page
arguments.description: Number of photos to return per page. If this argument is omitted, it defaults to 100. The maximum allowed value is 500.

arguments.name: page
arguments.description: The page of results to return. If this argument is omitted, it defaults to 1.

response:
<photos page="2" has_next_page="1" perpage="10">
  <photo id="2636" owner="47058503995@N01" secret="a123456" server="2" title="test_04" ispublic="1" isfriend="0" isfamily="0" />
  <photo id="2635" owner="47058503995@N01" secret="b123456" server="2" title="test_03" ispublic="0" isfriend="1" isfamily="1" />
  <photo id="2633" owner="47058503995@N01" secret="c123456" server="2" title="test_01" ispublic="1" isfriend="0" isfamily="0" />
  <photo id="2610" owner="12037949754@N01" secret="d123456" server="2" title="00_tall" ispublic="1" isfriend="0" isfamily="0" />
</photos>

errors.title: User not found.A user_id was passed which did not match a valid flickr user.
Invalid API KeyThe API key passed was not valid or has expired.
Service currently unavailableThe requested service is temporarily unavailable.

Format "xxx" not foundThe requested response format was not found.
Method "xxx" not foundThe requested method was not found.
Invalid SOAP envelopeThe SOAP envelope send in the request could not be parsed.
Invalid XML-RPC Method CallThe XML-RPC request document could not be parsed.
Bad URL foundOne or more arguments contained a URL that has been used for abuse on Flickr.
